item.name: ThumbSense
item.item:
What's ThumbSense ThumbSense changes key while touching a finger in TrackPad.
- F/J to LeftClick - D/K to RightClick - S/L to "CursorMove to ScrollWheel"
- G/H to History Back/Forward (Command+[/Command+]) - W to Close Window (Command+W) notsave.thumbsense

item.name: How to use
item.appendix: Note: You need a multi-touch device to use ThumbSense.
(1) Launch multi-touch extension from "Misc & Uninstall" tab.
(2) Click the icon in Dock to open preferences window.
